snippet.textDisplay: I am now on my second attack of this virus this year. I am fully vaccinated and boosted and it has not helped because at the school system I work for they do not require masks. I was wearing masks at work worrying about getting the flu from the children, but got the virus instead, twice. Everyone is saying kids can't get it. I am 75.
snippet.textOriginal: I am now on my second attack of this virus this year. I am fully vaccinated and boosted and it has not helped because at the school system I work for they do not require masks. I was wearing masks at work worrying about getting the flu from the children, but got the virus instead, twice. Everyone is saying kids can't get it. I am 75.

snippet.textDisplay: Anyone who still says kids can't get it has not been paying attention. Most of my class has had it in the last two months.
snippet.textOriginal: Anyone who still says kids can't get it has not been paying attention. Most of my class has had it in the last two months.

snippet.textDisplay: Absolutely maddening, and I feel for you - we are going through the same in my school district. One class had nearly 50% of kids out one week, and still no action - parents did not even bat an eye when an email came out and said there is an outbreak in your class. Kids still continue to unmask. I fear for the upcoming fall school year...
snippet.textOriginal: Absolutely maddening, and I feel for you - we are going through the same in my school district. One class had nearly 50% of kids out one week, and still no action - parents did not even bat an eye when an email came out and said there is an outbreak in your class. Kids still continue to unmask. I fear for the upcoming fall school year...

snippet.textDisplay: I'd suggest retiring if at all possible.  Or medical leave?  God bless you & good luck.
snippet.textOriginal: I'd suggest retiring if at all possible.  Or medical leave?  God bless you & good luck.
